title: Donâ€™t expect a low-end larger iMac in the near future as Apple focuses on new iMac Pro
content:
On the latest edition of the Power On newsletter, Bloomberg‘s Mark Gurman talks a lot about new Macs, new chips, and when to expect them. Even though, there’s a Mac people shouldn’t put their expectations on, as it looks Apple is not developing a low-end larger iMac.

more…

The post Don’t expect a low-end larger iMac in the near future as Apple focuses on new iMac Pro appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Bloomberg's Mark Gurman believes Apple will not launch a larger entry-level iMac, as it's focusing on the new iMac Pro.
